mapper.update:
UPDATE data_judge_re_match SET
data_judge_re_match.JudgeId = #{ judgeId },
data_judge_re_match.MatchId = #{ matchId },
data_judge_re_match.JudgeTypeId = #{ judgeTypeId },
data_judge_re_match.Avatar = #{ avatar },
data_judge_re_match.CirAvatar = #{ cirAvatar },
data_judge_re_match.InfoAvatar = #{ infoAvatar },
data_judge_re_match.FullAvatar = #{ fullAvatar },
data_judge_re_match.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_judge_re_match.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
